subject: RE: Separate Package for Test Cases or not ?
msgSnippet: ... I m not sure what you by a business environment . I receive jars and libraries (no sources) from other departments within my company, and I would LOVE to
messageBody:
RE: Separate Package for Test Cases or not ?

>That's fine for an open source project where the tests are an
>integral piece of the development process, and users may modify
>the application to suite their needs. But I don't think it's a
>very good idea in a business environment.

I'm not sure what you by a "business environment". I receive jars and libraries (no sources) from other departments within my company, and I would LOVE to receive the unit tests (preferably as source code, but even without)!

Ditto for third-party libraries and jars.
